question:
What minimum GPA is required to qualify for the Dean’s Honors List?
A. 3.50
B. 3.60
C. 3.65
D. 3.70

How many graded points must a student complete to be eligible for the Dean’s Honors List?
A. 24
B. 28
C. 30
D. 32

Which of the following disqualifies a student from the Dean’s Honors List?
A. A grade of P
B. A GPA of 3.60
C. A grade of Incomplete
D. Enrollment in less than 32 credits

What GPA is required for membership in a departmental honorary society?
A. 3.25
B. 3.35
C. 3.50
D. 3.65

When are Phi Beta Kappa candidates reviewed at NYU?
A. September
B. December
C. April
D. May

What is the minimum CAS residency requirement to be considered for Latin honors?
A. 48 points
B. 64 points
C. 80 points
D. 96 points

Grades of Pass (P) are:
A. Counted in GPA for honors
B. Not counted in GPA for honors
C. Required for honors
D. Equal to C grades

How is the cutoff GPA for summa cum laude determined?
A. GPA above 3.90
B. Fixed by department
C. Top 5% of previous class
D. Dean's discretion

What level of Latin honors is awarded to the next 10% after summa cum laude?
A. Cum laude
B. Magna cum laude
C. Distinction
D. Dean’s List

To be eligible for departmental honors, students must:
A. Complete 32 points
B. Have 3.50 GPA
C. Be recommended by faculty
D. Complete at least 64 graded points

What GPA is expected for graduation with departmental honors?
A. 3.50
B. 3.55
C. 3.60
D. 3.65

Which of the following is true about departmental high honors?
A. Automatically awarded
B. Based on faculty-defined criteria
C. Requires GPA above 3.90
D. Awarded only in sciences

Departmental honors programs must include at least:
A. One capstone seminar
B. Two semesters of coursework
C. Eight points including research project
D. Twelve credits of honors classes

A typical departmental honors thesis is:
A. 10–20 pages
B. 20–30 pages
C. 30–50 pages
D. 40–60 pages

All departmental honors students must:
A. Present publicly
B. Publish in a journal
C. Defend thesis to entire department
D. Present at MLK Conference

Double majors in unrelated fields must:
A. Do one honors thesis
B. Complete one research seminar
C. Fulfill honors in each major
D. Drop one major

Presidential Honors Scholars must maintain a GPA of at least:
A. 3.50
B. 3.60
C. 3.65
D. 3.70

MLK Scholars are selected for:
A. Financial need only
B. Leadership, academics, and service
C. Political activism
D. Athletics

What distinguishes Rudin Scholars?
A. They are from NYU Shanghai
B. They are public/parochial school grads from NYC
C. They study only business
D. They all study abroad

Which honors students may travel to NYU Florence in their first year?
A. Dean’s List recipients
B. MLK Scholars
C. Rudin Scholars
D. Presidential Honors Scholars
